remarks.format: ## Remarks 中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]包含的事件支持与 Silverlight 的兼容性。The event is included in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] to support compatibility with Silverlight. 如果不需要确保与 Silverlight 兼容, 请在 、 或上使用触控事件, 例如和。If you do not have to ensure compatibility with Silverlight, use the touch events, such as and , on , , or . 该事件不使用与其他 WPF 输入事件 ( 例如和) 相同的事件模型。The event does not use the same event model as other WPF input events, such as and . 事件是在应用程序级别处理的单个事件, 而不是作为可能通过 UI 的对象树路由的特定于元素的事件而公开。Instead of being exposed as an element-specific event that potentially routes through the object tree of a UI, the event is a single event that is handled at the application level. 因此, 不能使用事件`sender`处理程序的参数来确定所涉及的元素。Therefore, you cannot use the `sender` parameter of the event handler to determine what element is touched. 使用可以获取与 touch 事件相关的值。 Use the to get the values that are relevant to the touch event. 从中 , 你可以获取触控的, 并确定是、还是操作。 From the , you can get the of the touch and determine whether the was a , , or action. 你还可以使用来获取。You can also use the to get the . 从中 , 你可以确定设备并获取有关所涉及元素的信息。 From the , you can determine the device and get information about the element that is touched. ## Examples 下面的示例通过将两个手指拖到触摸屏上, 使你可以在上创建简单的模式。The following example enables you to create simple patterns on a by dragging two fingers across a touchscreen. 每个触控由表示。模式是通过在触控提供的触摸点之间绘制一条线来创建的。Each touch is represented by a .The pattern is created by drawing a line between the touch points provided by the touches. 此示例需要 Windows 触摸屏兼容屏幕。This example requires a Windows Touch-compatible screen. 下面的标记将创建用户界面, 该用户界面由一个中心在中。The following markup creates the user interface, which consists of a that is centered in a .
